description: As a User I want to access orders section So I view order details
name: User should be able to view order details

elements.name: User should be able to perform More actions on Bookings Page

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'

steps.name: I have created an order as a customer
I click the View button in Search Orders for a previously created order
I click the More Actions Button beside Edit Order
I should see a dropdown displayed
The dropdown should contain an option "Download Tickets"
The dropdown should contain an option "Resend Confirmation"
The dropdown should contain an option "View Message History"
The dropdown should contain an option "View Redemption History"
The dropdown should contain an option "View Transaction History"
The dropdown should contain an option "Cancel Order" which should have color "rgb(217, 63, 28)"

elements.name: User should be able to perform More actions on Bookings Page clicking on each option

steps.name: I click the View button in Search Orders for a previously created order
I click the More Actions Button beside Edit Order
I click on "Download Tickets" option
I should see a "confirmation" pdf file downloaded
I click on "Resend Confirmation" option
I should see a modal with Resend Email Header an Email address Label and and Input Field for the email and a Resend button
I clear the email input field
The Resend Button should be disabled
I reenter the valid email
The Resend Button should be enabled
I click the Resend Button
I should see a bottom toast with Background color "rgb(56, 161, 105)" with title "Email sent" and body "The confirmation email has been re-sent." and the modal should not be displayed
I click on "View Message History" option
I should see a modal with title "Message History"
The modal should have a table with headers "Action, Delivery, Result"
I click the modal close button
The "Message History" modal should be closed
I click on "View Redemption History" option
I should see a modal with title "Redemption History"
I click the modal close button
The "Redemption History" modal should be closed
I click on "View Transaction History" option
I should see a modal with title "Transaction History"
The modal should have a table with headers "Date, Transaction ID, Note, Provider, Method, Type, Total, Total All Time"
I click the modal close button
The "Transaction History" modal should be closed
I click on "Cancel Order" option
I should be taken to "Amending Booking" page
I should see text "The order will be cancelled" which should have color "rgb(217, 63, 28)"
